description:
Ryo tries to save Akemi`s life and career when she is targeted by professional assassin Silver Fox.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Model und der Killer - Teil 2
Ryo`s Her Future Husband?! Her Horoscope Says She`ll Meet and Marry Him! (Part Two)
Ryou wa Iinazuke!? Deatte Koishite Uranaimasu! (Kouhen)
獠は許嫁!? 出会って恋して占います! (後編)
